name: Planet Relocation
description:
In this game it is your job to help people find new home planets, however you will need to keep the requirements for each species in mind as you do so. Remember time is money! See how many assignments you can complete with the time limit!  If it's your first time playing, please read through the tutorial!

Created in two days as part of Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam from 3/12 -3/14 with the themes of "space" and "only one matters."

Programming by David de Sousa, and Theo Linardic 

Assets and Script by Daniel Garces

 Audio: https://soundbible.com/ https://incompetech.com/ https://www.bensound.com/ https://freesound.org/
